div.bibl: Otthon, Sept. 20, 1935. NOTICE TO CHICAGO SOUTHSIDE HUNGARIANS

body.p: The Hungarian-American Citizens' Association held their monthly officers meeting on Sept. 5th. After completing past business, the question concerning lack of interest shown by the South Side Hungarian-American citizens in local politics and the political clubs.
In the past, even as now they easily believed in opportunists, who used Hungarian organizations to further their own ends.

We request the South Side Hungarian-American citizens to become members of the Hungarian-American Citizens Association, a Hungarian
political club. This is the only club on the South Side officially recognized by civic leaders. Meetings are held on the second Thursday of each month at the Magyar Home.
